Who: CYCLONUS, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA, NIGHTRAZOR, Hydras, Perceptor
Location: Black Fortress - Throne Room

OOC: It is possible that Hydras may recognize these folks as having
fought along side Cyclonus and Scourge when they were working for
Unicron during that big battle some time ago.

BIC:

> Hydras just entered when Cyclonus was typing the message. "Ahhh, Friends of
> yours, Cyclonus; it's time that we have an important chat... You can Retire,
> Little one "He said to Nightlight" keep open your comlink "
>
> "Yes Sir"said the femme and she left the room and headed to her quarters
>
> Perceptor Arrived too and he sit down

Cyclonus turned as Hydras entered and nodded agreeably. "Greetings
Hydras." Cyclonus said as he came to stand in front of the three new
soldiers.

Cyclonus gestured at them as he continued spaeking, "You may recognize
them from the last battle we had." Cyclonus' voice dropped as he
talked, but the confidence in it continued. "These are my progeny." he
said carefully. "I created them with the last remnants of the matrix I
had absorbed, and gave them life."

Cyclonus gestured at each one in turn, "The first is called
Deepstryke, and he is an excellent tactical commander soldier."

As he spoke, the largest of the three soldiers stepped foward and
saluted Hydras.

"The next is named Phobia." Cyclonus said, gesturing at the red and
white female soldier. "She is an excellent warrior, but specializes in
psychological warfare."

The female nodded at Hydras, smiling coyly, at the last moment her
smile becoming more impish and daring.

"The last is called Nightrazor." Cyclonus said as he gestured at the
dark colored soldier. "He is one of the best infiltration experts I
have seen. Able to become invisible and teleport, there are few places
he cannot get to unseen."

Cyclonus turned back to Hydras, "He is the one I had watching the Ark
all this time."

Nightrazor just nodded at Hydras, saying nothing.

Deepstryke nodded as Cyclonus concluded the introductions, "Hydras, we
have come in repsonse to Cyclonus' call to arms. We have heard that
you have captured the Autobot leader. Is this true?"

(TAG)

Preston
